name: StarShot (FlamingSparrow)
description:
[PLAY IN FULLSCREEN FOR BEST EXPERIENCE]

[DO NOT CLICK QUIT ON WEBGL]

Welcome to StarShot! The aim of the game is to help our little star dude get to the sun by launching him out of his STAR CANNON! Traverse through several levels, using the gravity of other objects to propel him towards several suns until you eventually take out the robot planet himself, DEATHSPHERE! (Very creative name, as you can see)

Controls:

Aim with the mouse cursor.

Left Click to shoot the star.

Esc to pause the game.

Use the gravity of moons and planets to shoot yourself towards and get caught by the gravity of the sun.

Avoid Black Holes because if you get too close, they will suck you in.

Every planet has a white ring around it signifying it's gravity range.

If you shoot the star out of bounds, it will automatically respawn after a few seconds. Alternatively, you can use the reset button in the pause menu to restart the level.

Music : Frozen Jam by tgfcoder(https://twitter.com/tgfcoder)

Have Fun!
